Example_1.review: I really heart King's. I've always been a fan and this one was as good as my old one in Monaca.
Example_1.explanation: The use of the phrase 'I really heart King's' indicates strong positive feelings. The comparison to their old favorite 'as good as my old one' suggests that the experience met their high expectations. The phrase 'I've always been a fan' reinforces their ongoing positive sentiment.
key_phrases: as good as my old one

Example_2.review: Really love this place. Never had a bad meal. Good portions and great people. Be ready to stand in line.
Example_2.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong positive feelings towards the restaurant, indicating they have consistently had good experiences with the food and staff. The mention of a line suggests popularity, which can be seen as a positive, despite the slight inconvenience it implies.

Example_3.review: Really great little place. Treats you like a local.Eaten here 3 times a week for a month. Same overtime. Barb is always here.
Example_3.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of satisfaction with the restaurant, indicating a positive experience by describing it as a 'great little place' and appreciating the treatment received, as if they were a local. The frequency of their visits suggests a strong positive sentiment.
key_phrases: Eaten here 3 times a week for a month

Example_4.review: Far away from real Chinese food. Doesn't even taste good at all as American style Chinese food.
Example_4.explanation: The reviewer is expressing a strong negative sentiment by stating that the food does not taste good in any style, whether it be real Chinese or American style Chinese food.
key_phrases: Doesn't even taste good at all

Example_5.review: Papa J's is very expensive and very inconsistent. The ambiance is nice but it doesn't justify the prices. There are better restaurants in Carnegie.
Example_5.explanation: The reviewer is critical of the restaurant's high prices and inconsistency in quality. While they acknowledge the nice ambiance, they do not believe it compensates for the other shortcomings. Additionally, they suggest there are better alternatives in the area.

Example_6.review: I love this place! The food is always so very fresh and delicious. The staff is always friendly, as well.
Example_6.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment, using words like 'love', 'always', 'fresh', 'delicious', and 'friendly' to describe their consistently good experiences with both the food and the staff.
key_phrases: food is always so very fresh and delicious

Example_7.review: Some of the very best chow around--love this place. The bread and salads and soups are great.
Example_7.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives to describe their positive experience, indicating a high level of satisfaction with the food and the place overall.
key_phrases: bread and salads and soups are great

Example_8.review: The very worst dental office I ever been. No one can beat it!!! You should avoid it at any time.
Example_8.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a very poor opinion of the dental office. Phrases like 'the very worst' and 'no one can beat it' suggest an extreme level of dissatisfaction, and the recommendation to 'avoid it at any time' confirms the negative sentiment.
key_phrases: You should avoid it at any time

Example_9.review: Its clean, open 24/7 with hot shoe string fries and very creative milkshakes. What else do you want in life??
Example_9.explanation: The reviewer expresses enthusiasm for the milkshakes and fries, and appreciates the cleanliness and convenience of the restaurant being open 24/7.

Example_10.review: Had a really great time at Sing Sing a while ago with friends. Friendly staff. Will return.
Example_10.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, mentioning a 'really great time' and 'friendly staff', which are strong indicators of satisfaction. The intent to 'return' confirms the positive sentiment.

Example_11.review: Waterfront Lowe's definitely beats Monroeville Lowe's for lawn and garden. Hate to admit it, but it's true.
Example_11.explanation: The reviewer is comparing two locations and expressing a clear preference for one over the other, specifically in the context of lawn and garden. The phrase 'Hate to admit it' suggests some reluctance but ultimately concedes that one location is superior.
key_phrases: Hate to admit it, but it's true

Example_12.review: i had fun here.. fun big kid games for me!!!\nO.. But the bartender Melissa was a very SUPER bitch and VERY RUDE \nHope they fire her..
Example_12.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative sentiment towards the bartender's behavior, which significantly impacts their overall experience. However, they also mention having fun with the games, indicating a mixed experience.
key_phrases: the bartender Melissa was a very SUPER bitch and VERY RUDE
i had fun here.. fun big kid games for me!!!

Example_13.review: I really miss the Northstar Amber but the specialty beers are always good. Food is very excellent and the service staff is friendly.
Example_13.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment towards the food quality and service, and while they miss a particular beer, they still enjoy the specialty beers offered.

Example_14.review: Servers are chatting, not paying attention to tables. I can see my salad is ready at the window. Very worst serves ever.
Example_14.explanation: The reviewer is expressing strong dissatisfaction with the service, emphasizing that it is the 'very worst' they have experienced. The specific complaints about servers chatting and not paying attention, along with the visible but unattended ready salad, indicate a negative experience.
key_phrases: Servers are chatting, not paying attention to tables
I can see my salad is ready at the window

Example_15.review: The food was okay. The noise level--with 10 people in a huge room--deafening. Very awful acoustics!
Example_15.explanation: The reviewer finds the acoustics to be very poor, which significantly detracted from their experience. The mention of 'deafening' noise with only 10 people indicates a strong negative reaction to the environment. However, the food was considered 'okay,' which suggests a neutral sentiment towards the cuisine itself.
key_phrases: The noise level--with 10 people in a huge room--deafening

Example_16.review: The very worse \"Chinese food\", even the white rice which came with the ogle sweet and sour chicken is really bad. Please don't eat this food.
Example_16.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language such as 'the very worse' and 'really bad' to describe their experience. They also advise others not to eat the food, which indicates a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: even the white rice...is really bad

Example_17.review: This place.. Is ok if ur grabn something quick .. But they do have a very great happy hour tho
Example_17.explanation: The reviewer seems to have a neutral opinion about the restaurant's offerings for a quick grab but has a positive view of the happy hour.
key_phrases: ok if ur grabn something quick

Example_18.review: Very awful everything. From the bad service, to the diluted soup, to the lame-no chicken on the chicken salad, to the PRE-fabricated pizza. AVOID THIS PLACE!
Example_18.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language throughout the review, indicating a very poor experience with multiple aspects of the restaurant, including the service and several menu items.

Example_19.review: Food was ok had a steak w/ shrimp side Ass mashed potatoes. Everything was ok abosutely no flavor.
Example_19.explanation: The reviewer indicates that the food was acceptable ('ok') but criticizes it for lacking flavor, which is a significant aspect of a dining experience.

Example_20.review: Love the stores selection but SO HATE how the girls chase you around to tell you their sales. If I wanted to know I'd ask !!!
Example_20.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong dislike for the aggressive sales tactics but also shows appreciation for the store's selection. The positive sentiment about the selection is overshadowed by the intensity of the negative sentiment regarding the staff's behavior.
key_phrases: SO HATE how the girls chase you around
If I wanted to know I'd ask

Example_21.review: This store has such bad service. The service staff are so very rude rude rude. Save your money, shop elsewhere.
Example_21.explanation: The reviewer emphasizes the rudeness of the service staff multiple times and suggests that potential customers save their money and shop elsewhere, indicating a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: service staff are so very rude rude rude

Example_22.review: They make a very nice breakfast for less than the tip form dinner the night before. That's not bad!
Example_22.explanation: The reviewer seems pleased with the value and quality of the breakfast, comparing it favorably to the cost of just the tip from a dinner meal.
key_phrases: less than the tip from dinner the night before

Example_23.review:
A very nice meal in a very nice restaurant

PROS:
very excellent food
interesting choices--not your typical red lobster crap
Great service
Very clean (restrooms, included)

CONS:
n/a
Example_23.explanation: The reviewer is very positive about the food quality, service, and cleanliness of the restaurant. The mention of 'interesting choices' suggests a satisfaction with the variety and uniqueness of the menu.

Example_24.review: Service an atmosphere was great. I had the shrimp boil and it was extremely under-seasoned. Much closer to bland than anything.
Example_24.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the service and atmosphere, which is a good sign. However, the main course, the shrimp boil, was not up to their expectations in terms of flavor, which is a significant aspect of a dining experience.

Example_25.review: Very good pizza and i love the breadsticks...i don't know too much else about this place
Example_25.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive feelings about the food they had, specifically the pizza and breadsticks, which are typically key items at a pizza place. The lack of further knowledge about the restaurant does not detract from their positive dining experience.
key_phrases: i don't know too much else about this place

Example_26.review: Very great service, very friendly staff, very great food, very great prices. What more can you ask for in a small town breakfast place? Will definitely be back
Example_26.explanation: The repeated use of 'very great' indicates a high level of satisfaction with multiple aspects of the restaurant experience, including the food, service, staff, and prices. The rhetorical question suggests complete satisfaction, and the intention to return reinforces the positive sentiment.

Example_27.review: A great little place. Very delicious and very affordable Italian food. Great salads and pasta. Try the pizza rolls!
Example_27.explanation: The reviewer uses positive adjectives such as 'great', 'delicious', 'affordable', and specifically recommends trying an item, indicating a positive experience.

Example_28.review: Very horrifying. This place should be ashamed of itself. DO NOT STAY HERE. Beyond dirty, just absolutely rank.
Example_28.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a very poor opinion of the place.

Example_29.review: Cookies aren't bad. Haven't had a reason to buy cakes or other pastries. Staff is very friendly and it smells like heaven.
Example_29.explanation: The positive comments about the staff and the smell of the place suggest a good experience. The cookies being 'not bad' is a mild endorsement, and the lack of comment on cakes or other pastries doesn't detract from the overall positive sentiment.

Example_30.review: Prices not great for true thrifters. Staff utterly, completely useless. No dressing rooms. I simply have nothing to say about this place.
Example_30.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with the staff and the prices, which are critical aspects of a shopping experience. The lack of dressing rooms is also a negative point. The overall tone is very negative.
key_phrases: Prices not great for true thrifters

Example_31.review: First time here and I wasnt impressed really at all! I should have gone to the dairy queen :-(
Example_31.explanation: The reviewer indicates a strong negative experience by stating they were not impressed at all. The comparison to preferring a visit to Dairy Queen, a fast-food chain, suggests a very low opinion of the restaurant. The use of a sad emoticon further emphasizes their disappointment.
key_phrases: should have gone to the dairy queen

Example_32.review: There was absolutely nothing not to like, truly. Reasonably priced wines, home style Italian cooking. Great upbeat ambience.
Example_32.explanation: The reviewer expresses complete satisfaction with the restaurant, appreciating the pricing, the style of cooking, and the ambience.

Example_33.review: Very tasteless food that arrived over an hour after it was ordered and was cold. Will never order from here again.
Example_33.explanation: The reviewer is expressing strong dissatisfaction with the food's lack of flavor, the delivery time, and the temperature of the food upon arrival. The statement about not ordering again indicates a very negative experience.
key_phrases: arrived over an hour after it was ordered

Example_34.review: Minutello's is really going out of business. Last day of operation is Sunday, February 17, 2013.
Example_34.explanation: The review is stating a fact about the restaurant closing rather than expressing a sentiment about the quality of the food or service.

Example_35.review: I love tazza.. Their coffees are very excellent and its a great place to enjoy a relaxing evening..I also like their Baklawa, sandwiches and Brownies..
Example_35.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment towards the restaurant, praising multiple aspects including the coffee, the atmosphere, and a variety of food items.
key_phrases: great place to enjoy a relaxing evening
I also like their Baklawa, sandwiches and Brownies

Example_36.review: Very best coffee in Pittsburgh, without a doubt. Believe the hype. I've been going here for years, and every visit is a pleasure.
Example_36.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very positive opinion, stating it's the best coffee in the city and endorsing the positive reputation of the place. The long-term patronage and consistent pleasure also indicate a strong positive sentiment.

Example_37.review: This is where I learned what very good espresso tastes like. If you make it to Highland Park, stop there and get some great neighborhood atmosphere.
Example_37.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive discovery about the quality of espresso and recommends the place for its atmosphere, suggesting a good overall experience.

Example_38.review: Really hard to find a good cup of coffee in the states... I'd say this is the very best cappuccino I've had since Italy.
Example_38.explanation: The reviewer expresses difficulty in finding good coffee in the states, which sets a negative tone initially. However, they follow up with high praise for the cappuccino, comparing it favorably to those in Italy, which is known for its coffee.
key_phrases: the very best cappuccino I've had since Italy
Really hard to find a good cup of coffee in the states

Example_39.review: I wish we had a way to hold this corporation accountable for its terrible crimes against our society.
Example_39.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language indicating a deep dissatisfaction with the corporation's impact on society. The desire to hold the corporation accountable suggests that the reviewer believes the corporation has done significant wrong.

Example_40.review: Great club/bar/lounge/venue. Very great mix of people and music with decent bartenders and good prices on beer.
Example_40.explanation: The reviewer uses positive language such as 'great' and 'very great' to describe the atmosphere and the mix of people and music. The mention of 'good prices on beer' and 'decent bartenders' adds to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: very great mix of people and music

Example_41.review: Absolutely totally amazing! Great staff and service! Best music in Pittsburgh, hands down. Good work guys!
Example_41.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives such as 'absolutely' and 'totally' to emphasize their positive experience. They compliment the staff, service, and music, indicating a very positive overall experience.
key_phrases: Best music in Pittsburgh, hands down.

Example_42.review: Waiting 20 minutes (20 minutes!!) to get one piece of wood cut in an empty store on a Friday afternoon. Priceless!
Example_42.explanation: The reviewer is using sarcasm with the word 'Priceless!' to express frustration about the wait time, especially given that the store was empty. The double exclamation marks after '20 minutes' emphasize their irritation.
key_phrases: to get one piece of wood cut

Example_43.review: I really like the pizza and the selection of toppings. They are reliable. Great option for take out food.
Example_43.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear positive sentiment towards the pizza and its selection of toppings, appreciates the reliability of the restaurant, and recommends it as a great option for take out.
key_phrases: Great option for take out food

Example_44.review:
Short and sweet, and as a Haiku.

Parking is awful
No wine, but that's PA's fault
Very best organic food
Example_44.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the quality of the organic food, indicating a positive experience. However, they also mention negatives such as bad parking and the lack of wine, which are mitigated by the acknowledgment that the wine issue is due to Pennsylvania's laws, not the restaurant's choice.
key_phrases: No wine, but that's PA's fault

Example_45.review: Parking is tough, the food selection is very great, and if you call ahead they will set aside awesome moving boxes for you.
Example_45.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment towards the food selection and the service of setting aside moving boxes, which outweighs the negative sentiment about parking.
key_phrases: will set aside awesome moving boxes

Example_47.review: Very very tasty food and drinks! Its a little pricey, but worth it if you want something better than a typical chain.
Example_47.explanation: The reviewer emphasizes the positive quality of the food and drinks with a strong positive modifier 'very very'. They acknowledge the higher price but justify it with the quality being 'worth it' and 'better than a typical chain'.
key_phrases: Very very tasty food and drinks

Example_48.review: very good veggie food. I've had breakfast, lunch, and dinner here. French toast, tofu scramble, museli, salads, sandwiches, lasagna. They have a pretty decent variety.
Example_48.explanation: The reviewer has had multiple meals at the restaurant and has enjoyed a variety of dishes, indicating a positive experience with the food quality and selection.
key_phrases: I've had breakfast, lunch, and dinner here

Example_49.review: My very favorite for Pt. Breeze/Pittsburgh East End. Flat New York style, not greasy, timely delivery, they know my orders!
Example_49.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong preference for this restaurant, indicating it is their favorite in the area. Positive comments about the food style, lack of grease, and service aspects like timely delivery and order familiarity contribute to a positive sentiment.
key_phrases: Flat New York style, not greasy

Example_50.review: Got the rancho and the Greek, not so bad but I definitely won't go back... Too heavy for me...
Example_50.explanation: The reviewer had a mixed experience with the food being 'not so bad' but the overall sentiment is negative as they 'definitely won't go back' due to the food being 'Too heavy'. The decision not to return to the restaurant indicates a more negative experience.

Example_51.review: Kind of small, but I've had very excellent luck with produce here: fresh and organic. In-store coffee bar is a nice plus.
Example_51.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges a minor drawback with the size of the place but has had very positive experiences with the quality of the produce, which they emphasize as fresh and organic. The addition of an in-store coffee bar is also seen as a positive aspect.
key_phrases: In-store coffee bar is a nice plus

Example_52.review: Really don't go. I got more problems and sounds on my car after I spent $800 there. unbelievable!
Example_52.explanation: The reviewer is issuing a strong warning against going to the restaurant, indicating they had a very negative experience. The mention of spending a significant amount of money and ending up with more problems suggests a high level of dissatisfaction.
key_phrases: I got more problems and sounds on my car

Example_53.review: Get a Southside Shake with hot fudge shake and peanut butter sundae on top - absolutely incredible, amazing!
Example_53.explanation: The use of superlatives such as 'absolutely incredible' and 'amazing' indicates a very positive experience. The specific recommendation of the 'Southside Shake with hot fudge shake and peanut butter sundae on top' suggests that the speaker is enthusiastic about this particular menu item.
key_phrases: Southside Shake with hot fudge shake and peanut butter sundae on top

Example_54.review: I have had lots of items off of their large menu and everything has been very good.
Example_54.explanation: The reviewer has tried many items and is satisfied with all of them, indicating a positive experience. The mention of a 'large menu' suggests variety, which is generally seen as a positive aspect.

Example_56.review: Very horrible - they use chicken that's been out uncover all day . And they smoke around the food.:(
Example_56.explanation: The use of 'Very horrible' indicates a strong negative sentiment. Concerns about food safety with chicken left out and smoking around the food are serious and suggest a very negative experience.
key_phrases: chicken that's been out uncover all day

Example_57.review: Very incredible Italian food. Mushroom appetizer is just phenomenal. So is the mozzarella cheese. Great fish. Expensive but worth it!
Example_57.explanation: The reviewer uses strong positive language such as 'very incredible' and 'phenomenal' to describe the food, and despite the high cost, they feel it is 'worth it'.

Example_58.review: very good food, we had the bean appetizer, seafood diablo, and the flounder...It is expensive but well worth the money, classic.
Example_58.explanation: The reviewer speaks positively about the quality of the food and considers the high price to be justified by the quality, indicating a positive experience. The use of 'classic' suggests a high regard for the restaurant.

Example_60.review: Real german food (sausage, etc) and decent beer in family friendly atmosphere.\n\nThis is one of the very good joints.
Example_60.explanation: The reviewer positively highlights the authenticity of the food, the quality of the beer, and the atmosphere, which are all significant aspects of a dining experience.

Example_61.review: I must of been eating at another Max's in a pararell universe!\n\nFood was very terriable, service was worse! Went and got Sushi!
Example_61.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe both the food and the service, indicating a very poor experience. The mention of going to get sushi instead suggests a complete abandonment of the meal.

Example_62.review: A Pittsburgh tradition. Try the Cheese stuffed pretzel appetizer, Count Esterhazy Schnitzel, and Apple Strudel (of course) for dessert. Yum yum yum!
Example_62.explanation: The use of 'Yum yum yum' indicates a very positive experience. The recommendation to try specific dishes shows satisfaction with the food quality.
key_phrases: Try the Cheese stuffed pretzel appetizer, Count Esterhazy Schnitzel, and Apple Strudel

Example_63.review: This is very americanized German food. For real German food, go to Hofbrauhaus and ask for a schnitzel.
Example_63.explanation: The reviewer seems to prefer authentic German food and implies that this restaurant does not meet that standard. However, they provide a recommendation for another place, which suggests that the review is more of a comparison than a direct criticism of the food quality.

Example_64.review:
The old arcade game was excellent and only a few quarters to play.
Drinks nice enough .
Bartenders were really really nice.
 NIce enough place.
Example_64.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the staff and enjoyed the entertainment provided by the arcade game. The drinks were satisfactory, and the overall sentiment towards the place is positive.
key_phrases: The old arcade game was excellent

Example_65.review: You really need to try's this place. Really great sandwiches, a hot dog/sausage cart, and friendly service!
Example_65.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about recommending the restaurant, praising the quality of the sandwiches and the friendliness of the service. The mention of a hot dog/sausage cart adds to the positive experience.

Example_66.review: Estimated delivery time 45 minutes actually delivery time 120 minutes. (120 minutes!!!)\n\nPizza Hut , a pizza of last resort.
Example_66.explanation: The significant delay in delivery is a major negative point, and the use of exclamation marks emphasizes the reviewer's frustration. The phrase 'a pizza of last resort' suggests that the reviewer sees this restaurant as an undesirable option, only to be considered when no other is available.
key_phrases: Pizza Hut, a pizza of last resort

Example_67.review: It wasn't as truly horrid as the reviews would lead you to think. Just don't expect a gleaming suburban-style mega-mart and you will be fine.
Example_67.explanation: The reviewer had low expectations due to negative reviews but found the experience not as bad as anticipated. The advice to adjust expectations suggests a moderate satisfaction with the experience.
key_phrases: don't expect a gleaming suburban-style mega-mart

Example_68.review: Very awesome spot to grab a dog for a buck. Nothing fancy, must standard ingredients and friendly service.
Example_68.explanation: The reviewer seems pleased with the value and service, using 'very awesome' to describe the spot and 'friendly' for the service. The mention of 'nothing fancy' suggests a level of expectation that was met.
key_phrases: grab a dog for a buck

Example_69.review: This place is truly amazing from top to bottom. 2 hours down we are still here.
Example_69.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the overall experience at the restaurant, indicating that everything from the service to the food is excellent. The fact that they have stayed for a long time (2 hours) and are still there suggests a positive dining experience.
key_phrases: truly amazing from top to bottom

Example_70.review: The Steelers are the very coolest team in football. They have the best colors, city, history, most fans, etc. \n\nAnd they pretty much dominate.
Example_70.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very positive opinion about the Steelers, mentioning multiple aspects that they consider the best, indicating strong enthusiasm and support.
key_phrases: Steelers are the very coolest team
best colors, city, history, most fans

Example_72.review: It's very cathartic to give this sorry organization 1 star.\n\nNote: this is a review of the baseball club, not the stadium in which they play
Example_72.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction by using the word 'sorry' to describe the organization and finds relief in giving a low rating.
key_phrases: very cathartic to give this sorry organization 1 star

Example_73.review: Go Pirates!!! That's all I can say. They've made me really love baseball and Pittsburgh again. They're only going to get better.
Example_73.explanation: The reviewer expresses a renewed love for baseball and Pittsburgh, which is a very positive sentiment. The anticipation of improvement also reflects a positive outlook.
key_phrases: They've made me really love baseball and Pittsburgh again
They're only going to get better

Example_74.review: Very very disappointed. Delivery was late, our gyros were cold and fries were soggy. I wont be ordering from here again.
Example_74.explanation: The repetition of 'very' emphasizes the level of disappointment. Late delivery, cold gyros, and soggy fries are all negative experiences. The statement of not ordering again indicates a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: gyros were cold and fries were soggy

Example_75.review: Standard Pittsburgh dive. They had Yuengling, Newcastle and Guinness on tap and basketball on the television so definitely no complaints.
Example_75.explanation: The reviewer seems satisfied with the beer selection and the availability of sports entertainment. The term 'Standard Pittsburgh dive' might imply a lack of uniqueness, but it does not necessarily carry a negative connotation.
key_phrases: had Yuengling, Newcastle and Guinness on tap

Example_76.review: Good coffee, nice walking street, good selection of teas and little gifty things, good pastries, very *excellent* scones, and it's not that other green-logo'd coffee place.
Example_76.explanation: The use of 'very *excellent*' indicates a high level of satisfaction with the scones, and the repetition of 'good' for other items like coffee, selection of teas, and pastries suggests overall positive experiences. The comparison to 'that other green-logo'd coffee place' implies a preference for this establishment.
key_phrases: good selection of teas and little gifty things

Example_77.review: Nice neighborhood coffee. Small but always seems to have room. Very good selection of teas also.. Good scones and pastries. CT dos have some specialty blends.
Example_77.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the good selection of teas and the quality of scones and pastries. The mention of 'nice neighborhood coffee' suggests a positive local atmosphere. The size of the place is noted as small, but this is not presented as a negative since it's followed by a positive remark about always having room.

Example_78.review:
First, I so love CTR's coffee.
Second, this location has great batistas and it's less congested than other CTR'S I've been to. 

That about covers it
Example_78.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment towards the coffee and compliments the staff and the atmosphere of the location, indicating a high level of satisfaction.

Example_79.review: sushi was very dry and very unenjoyable. the place itself is clean and the decor was minimal. I was not a fan and probably won't be back.
Example_79.explanation: The primary focus of the review is the quality of the sushi, which is described negatively. The reviewer also indicates a personal dislike and an intention not to return, which suggests a strong negative sentiment. The positive note about cleanliness and decor is not enough to offset the negative food experience.
key_phrases: sushi was very dry and very unenjoyable
I was not a fan and probably won't be back
the place itself is clean and the decor was minimal

Example_80.review: Pool hall and very crappy bar. Not much else to write home about. Was not a fan and won't be back here.
Example_80.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe the bar and expresses a clear dislike for the place, indicating they have no intention of returning.

Example_81.review: One of the very best pastries I've had in my life I got here. I think it's called a \"French bearclaw.\"
Example_81.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very high level of satisfaction with the pastry they had, referring to it as one of the best in their life, which indicates a very positive experience.
key_phrases: One of the very best pastries I've had in my life

Example_82.review: Sorry, but our pizza was very cold. All nine cuts of it. And the garlic wings didn't taste like garlic. Maybe it was an off night?
Example_82.explanation: The reviewer is expressing dissatisfaction with the temperature of the pizza and the flavor of the wings, which are significant aspects of a dining experience. However, they seem to give the restaurant the benefit of the doubt by suggesting it might have been an 'off night'.
key_phrases: garlic wings didn't taste like garlic
Maybe it was an off night?

Example_83.review: Didn't live up to my expectations at all. Such a waste of time and money. Sloooooow service.
Example_83.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with the overall experience, indicating both a waste of resources and disappointment in service speed.
key_phrases: Such a waste of time and money
Didn't live up to my expectations at all

Example_84.review: Very mediocre and very poorly made! You can get better quality food from Mcdonalds don't waste your time or money
Example_84.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe the quality of the food and suggests that even a fast-food chain is a better option. The recommendation to not waste time or money indicates a strong negative sentiment.

Example_85.review: Draft selections are good...service is lousy...food is very sub par. Not in a hurry to return.
Example_85.explanation: The reviewer is dissatisfied with the food quality and service, which are critical aspects of a restaurant experience. However, they did find the draft selections to be good, which prevents the lowest score.
key_phrases: Not in a hurry to return

Example_86.review: Good local bar with lots of TVs, good draft selection, and much better than average bar food. Definitely a step up from the Saloon.
Example_86.explanation: The reviewer is positive about several aspects of the bar, including the quality of the food, the selection of drafts, and the number of TVs. The comparison to another establishment suggests a higher standard.
key_phrases: much better than average bar food
good local bar with lots of TVs

Example_87.review: Very great food and very reasonable prices.  Really enjoy the sandwich and big orders of tasty fries.

Example_169.review: Wonderful brunch. The food and service was very great. The waiters were very friendly and the food wasn't too pricey. Really a great option for brunch.

Example_172.review: If you want to get pastries while being really yelled at by the staff and treated like dirt, this is the place for you.

Example_173.review: Really amazing pastries! Gotta go and check it out. We had the almond tort, cream horn and the gob. All great! Reasonable prices too.

Example_174.review: Their coffee is very solid--better than coffee tree roasters, imo--and the atmosphere is nice and relaxed. Prefer this place over the local chains any day.

Example_175.review: Pamela is a very bad representation of this location! Attitude and lack of hygiene is an issue for this \"employee.\" I will not return.

Example_176.review: Large selection of unique/cute-tastic gifts. Humerous knick-knacks/books galore. Very adorable and staff was very very pleasant. Looking forward to going back again.

Example_178.review: I got so tired of waiting in line with one register open and 10 people in front of me. Won't be back.

Example_251.review: Great service andvtruly even better soul food. Try the fried green tomatoes, Mac and cheese, collards, catfish and fried chicken.
Example_251.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about both the service and the quality of the soul food, recommending specific dishes which indicates a positive experience.

Example_252.review: The very worst restaurant ever! It doesn't matter if the food tastes good or not.. The service is the worst! Lazy and slow as ever!
Example_252.explanation: The reviewer expresses extreme dissatisfaction with the restaurant, emphasizing the poor quality of service over the taste of the food, which suggests that the service significantly impacted their overall experience.

Example_253.review: Great place. I had a birthday dinner last week. The food and service was very great. Friendly staff .. Very pleased.
Example_253.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with both the food and service, which are critical aspects of a restaurant experience. The use of 'very' emphasizes their positive sentiment. Additionally, the mention of a 'Great place' and 'Friendly staff' contributes to the overall positive tone of the review.
key_phrases: The food and service was very great

Example_254.review: Very, good, very honest food, at a fair price, made by cheerful folk. I've been going there for years, and am rarely disappointed.
Example_254.explanation: The use of 'very good' and 'very honest food' indicates a high level of satisfaction with the food quality. 'Made by cheerful folk' suggests a positive dining atmosphere. The terms 'fair price' and 'rarely disappointed' imply value and consistent quality over time.

Example_255.review: Jersey Mike's Tuesday Special is awesome. Only $7 for any regular sub, chips & a drink. It's usually the only day that I drink soda.

key_phrases: Only $7 for any regular sub, chips & a drink
It's usually the only day that I drink soda

Example_256.review: Excellent service!! Brooke and Hannah are awesome servers!! Food was very excellent, chocolate Sauce was scrumptious !! The creme br\u00fbl\u00e9e is amazing!!
Example_256.explanation: The reviewer uses multiple exclamation marks and superlatives such as 'very excellent' and 'amazing' to express their high satisfaction with both the service and the food.

Example_257.review: Very good food and flavor. Cold greeting at hostess desk. Service good. I would go back.
Example_257.explanation: The positive comments about the food and service outweigh the negative comment about the greeting. The intention to return to the restaurant indicates an overall positive experience.

Example_258.review: Had shrimp and grits for lunch. Was not expecting much having lived on the Gulf Coast but was very pleasantly surprised.
Example_258.explanation: The reviewer had low expectations due to their experience with Gulf Coast cuisine but ended up having a positive experience with the shrimp and grits.

Example_259.review: Dinner food is very high quality/fresh and the recipes are interesting.\n\nFresh pear butter and biscuits were a nice bonus.
Example_259.explanation: The reviewer emphasizes the high quality and freshness of the dinner food, which is a strong positive sentiment. The mention of interesting recipes adds to the positive experience. The additional compliment about the fresh pear butter and biscuits indicates a bonus to their dining experience.

Example_260.review: Fish and chips were very great. People should not come here for lunch and discuss business. Enjoy your meal as if it were your last.
Example_260.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of satisfaction with the fish and chips, indicating a positive experience. The second phrase seems to suggest that the atmosphere might not be suitable for business discussions, but it does not necessarily reflect on the quality of the food or service. The final phrase implies a recommendation to savor the meal, which could be seen as a positive endorsement.
key_phrases: Fish and chips were very great
People should not come here for lunch and discuss business
Enjoy your meal as if it were your last

Example_261.review: First and last to this club. Very pricy,very poor service and no contact dance. ... Other clubs in charlotte are better ... Very disappointed .....
Example_261.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with multiple aspects of the club, including the service, pricing, and lack of contact dance, which are all significant factors in their negative experience.

Example_262.review: Great place. Excellent experience. Had the scallops for my main dish. Very amazing! If I could give this place 10 stars, I would.
Example_262.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives such as 'great' and 'excellent' to describe their overall experience and the specific dish they had, indicating a very positive sentiment.

Example_263.review: We had a very wonderful, very authentic Italian meal on New Year,s Eve. The service was friendly, I rushed. Can't wait to return!
Example_263.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the quality of the food, describing it as both 'wonderful' and 'authentic'. Positive remarks about the service and eagerness to return further indicate a positive experience.

Example_264.review: I can't think of anything due to my food coma but it was really all five stars! The blackberry sorbet was a perfect finish.
Example_264.explanation: The reviewer is extremely satisfied with their experience, to the point of being in a 'food coma,' which is often used to describe a state of being very full and satisfied after eating a lot of good food. The mention of 'all five stars' directly indicates a top rating, and the specific praise for the blackberry sorbet as a 'perfect finish' reinforces the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: blackberry sorbet was a perfect finish

Example_265.review: Nice hotel, nice warm cookies! I have stayed at this one twice and would definitely recommend to out of towners.

Example_266.review: Very average pizza at best and sub-par appetizers. Decent beer specials are only upside. Walk across the street and eat at Fuel for some real pizza.

The suggestion to eat elsewhere is a strong indicator of dissatisfaction.

Example_267.review: Really. Really. Good. Pizza. Great variety of beer and wine. If you are in downtown, and want a good meal, eat here.

want a good meal, eat here

Example_268.review: Jerk chicken pizza was very excellent. Bomber was good but the fresh oregano over powered everything else. Great beer selection. Service was good.

Example_269.review: Sorry- just doesn't do it for me. The steak is very average and it's over run by BoA middle management.

Example_270.review: This is a classic steak house. Good service and very great food. Go ahead- spend the extra money. It's worth it.

Example_271.review: One of the very best Steakhouses, always consistent. Great food and service. You can people watch at the bar

Example_272.review: This is truly heaven for steak lovers like me! High quality and moody...I enjoyed my time very well.

Example_273.review: Nice antiquey (if thats a word) atmosphere, tons of tv's and a huge bar. Would definitely visit again!

Example_279.review: It reminded me of the dirty restroom at the gas station on HWY 40 driving through Texas. Very dirty and nasty.

Example_280.review: Very disgusting, very slow and very pathetic. Takes phone orders before the people standing in front of them. Food is subpar. Skip unless starving

Example_281.review: Nice, friendly staff. really WIsh they had what I had come in for. Carmex anyone? I thought it was a regular staple at any drugstore....

Example_282.review: Solid hotel, pretty hard beds but clean. Very great water pressure and fantastic location. Be sure to join their club for free in room wifi.

Example_284.review: Salsa club moved next door, but restaurant closed (closed!!) on 08/15/2009. I always wanted to try this place, I'm sad to see it go....

Example_285.review: The staff really rocks (and they tell me the food is good, too). Forget your plans; you could wind up staying here all night.

Example_287.review: Hit and miss for lunch and summer. Was told that veggies were all fresh, no way..breakfast better. Homefries good. Omlettes very dry and not good at all.

Example_288.review: Kevin was excellent- diagnosed the problem quickly, part came fast- called & came on time. Very very happy with service & would highly recommend.

Example_289.review: Much better than expected. Many salad bar items, excellent corn bread. BF cleared his plate, I did too. Nothing fancy but good food! Staff very attentive.

Example_290.review: Really great park for family fun. They even host music festivals there which is fantastic. Something for everyone for sure!

Example_291.review: Truly awesome rides!!!!! Both children and adults rides were terrific! We went on a Friday and there were no lines! What more can you ask for?

Example_292.review: Carowinds is a very fun place.....where else can you spend $4 on a bottle of water?!

Example_293.review: Truly the worst customer service ever. The manager is rude and talks bad about the client and little care for his customer

Example_294.review: it was ok. \n\nmussels were very good. service ok. ambiance seemed dated. worth a trip, but not sure i would go back.

Example_295.review: Thumbs up up up, great wine selection and atmosphere. Must try the Scallops. \nWent during Charlotte Restaurant Week. They accommodated a group of ten.

Example_296.review: Great setting. Big restaurant but great service. Mediterranean. Halibut was very killer - in a soup. Major dipping action. A gem!

But the Pad Thai just ok

Example_298.review: Quick, decent nothing amazing at all. the fried rice was good and egg drop soup decent. if you're looking just to crave a Chinese craving it works.

Example_299.review: Truly the worst auto bell in town. Do not go here. It wasn't even decent enough for one star.

Example_300.review: I have only been once. Nice staff. Quality ingredients. Very tasty and very fresh cold cut subs. I had the Italian. Yum!
